entry.title: Unarmoured
entry.summary:
Author: HowDidIGetHere20

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,559Chapters: 4/20Kudos: 4

Summary: Arthur has always taken Merlin on every mission—unarmoured, untrained, endlessly reckless.It never used to matter.But lately, every danger feels sharper. Every close call lasts too long.And Merlin is starting to notice the way Arthur hovers… and how the prince’s worry is beginning to look a lot like something else.

entry.title: Merlin and the Stoor Wyrm {Prompt: Bite}
entry.summary:
Author: MiaGhost

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,096Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: My fill for Tumblr's @merthurmicrofic prompt: BiteAlso fills my Tournament Bingo Dec 2025 squares for: Fairytale AU, Different first meeting, Excalibur, Past Tense, Third Person POV and Mythical Creatures.  A great beast has best Camelot, and the land is in need of a hero. After a lifetime of dreaming up stories I'd adventure, Merlin might just be that hero. Based loosely on the Scottish fairytale of Assipattle and the Stoor Worm. (In some parts, VERY loosely.)

entry.title: hark and hush
entry.summary:
Author: haloud

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,672Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 17

Summary: A whistling wind raked through the trees, and Arthur ducked, hiding his face within his deep, crimson hood. He could only hope the physician might greet him with something hot to drink, for surely he must be there soon; it was hard to track the passing of the sun through such dense foliage, and the days were short this time of year, but Arthur had left Camelot in mid-morning, just late enough for the sun’s rays to crack the seal of frost upon the world. Somewhere in the distance, a wolf howled. Or was it so far? Sound traveled as strangely as light in these woods. The next step Arthur took, the next crunch of boot on snow, echoed strangely, doubled up. “You know you’re going the wrong way, don’t you, friend?”Prince Arthur walks into the woods on a snowy morning with a basket of herbs for Gaius, the physician who lives deep within and was said to create remedies for any illness. On the path, he meets a strange young man who claims to be Gaius's nephew and offers to show Arthur the way.

entry.title: Definity in the Top Three
entry.summary:
Author: TheMagicArts

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,019Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 16

Summary: If Arthur had known his lawyer was going to be this handsome, he would’ve filed for divorce a lot sooner. Unfortunately for Arthur, Merlin has committed himself to a life of singledom, crankiness, and morals. Slowly, Arthur’s charming qualities heal something inside Merlin that he didn’t break. Part I: Arthur's POVPart II: Merlin's POV Excerpt (paraphrased): “Are you gay?” Arthur asked his lawyer. "Excuse me?" “Are you part of the LGBTQA+ community?” Arthur asked, rephrasing. “That’s irrelevant to this case.” Arthur leaned towards the desk slightly. “But relevant to my interests.”

entry.title: Love in War [Merthur]
entry.summary:
Author: Shadya_19

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,409Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Deep within the mysterious, dark forest, I found Merlin, a lost and helpless nine-year-old boy. As a prince, the son of the powerful Sultan, my destiny seemed predetermined, but my heart urged me to bring him to the palace and raise Merlin as my own son. Despite my father's objections and the resistance of Mahidebran, my favorite concubine, who already had a son with me named Mustafa, I couldn't resist the idea of ​​giving my young heir an older brother. What I didn't know then was how tangled our family history would become, nor how Merlin would change our lives in ways we could never have imagined. "One person's peace of mind is another's calamity."

entry.title: Stone Cold Lips
entry.summary:
Author: AluminiumBottleOfWater

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,327Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 156

Summary: In which Merlin is immortal, used all of his free time to do things because he'd go crazy otherwise and got filthy rich like an old vampire without meaning to, hung out with Shakespeare and a bunch of other people because why not, got gifted a pretty Cadillac that he hates by a charity he'd forgotten he'd donated to, and has a too-high alcohol tolerance for his liking. Oh, and he bought Avalon Lake. Because "Shut up, I just like looking at this lake and no, I don't need help." And a bunch of other mansions and estates and penthouses all over the country because "What if he wants to live somewhere else, I need to have OPTIONS."

entry.title: The Hollow Dark
entry.summary:
Author: hungryhippolyta

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,257Chapters: 14/25Kudos: 194

Summary: Fourteen hundred years before Lyra Belacqua's fateful discoveries, the nature of Dust is an arcane mystery. Sorcerers, warlocks and witches roam the island of Albion, forced into hiding by a ruthless King and a Magisterium still in its infancy. The future of Brytain will be determined by those who can control Dust...or by those who seek to destroy it. Meanwhile, Merlin, a young warlock fleeing persecution, finds a new home right under the nose of his greatest enemy. He's destined to protect the Once and Future King -- but then again, the dragon in the basement might be a bit cracked in the head. And between hiding his magic from one Uther Pendragon and keeping his still-unsettled dæmon a secret, Merlin's got enough on his plate already...

entry.title: Freaky medieval friday
entry.summary:
Author: Enoch_1958

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,772Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 20

Summary: Merlin and Mordred swap bodies after they both said that they wished to have someone else´s life to improve one´s own, the universe knows that they need the help of the other to achieve it, so here they are. At the end they have a brother-like relationship and Arthur pulls his head out of his ass. This is based on another fanfic that is really good, as soon as I find it again I will put the name here.Kudos and Comments are very appreciated.
